welcome_message:
This template creates a Databricks Asset Bundle for UV.
For more information, please visit https://github.com/JenspederM/dab-uv

project_name.pattern_match_failure_message: Project name must be at least 3 characters long and cannot contain the following characters: "\", "/", " ", ".", and must be all lowercase letters.

minimum_python_version.pattern_match_failure_message: Version must be in the format 'X.Y' where X and Y are numbers.
minimum_python_version.description: Minimum supported Python version. 3.10 is the default (and lowest supported version by databricks-connect).

line_length.description: Maximum line length for black formatting. Default is 88.

project_slug.description: Project slug. Default is a slugified version of the project name.

success_message:
---
Successfully created Databricks Asset Bundle for UV.

To use the CI pipeline, you must set the following values in your CI environment:
- `vars.DATABRICKS_HOST`
- `secrets.DATABRICKS_TOKEN`
